text: apache cassandra is a popular
open source database that developers use
for applications requiring fast
performance
and massive scalability but because of
its complex and difficult maintenance
operations
it requires specialized knowledge to
manage large clusters with hundreds or
thousands of nodes
and is hard to get the performance you
need amazon key spaces for apache
cassandra
is a scalable highly available and fully
managed database service that can run
your cassandra workloads
more easily it works with your existing
cassandra drivers and developers tools
and uses open source cassandra apis
making it simple to migrate
and operate your workloads in the cloud
you're enabled to focus on building
better applications
because key spaces is serverless there
are no clusters to provision
patch or manage and tables automatically
scale up and down
as your application load changes get
single digit millisecond latency
at any scale with 99.99
availability your data is encrypted and
you can enable continuous backups
by using point in time recovery you can
also use key spaces to store large
volumes of time series data and
information about devices
for internet of things applications
getting started is as easy as updating a
few lines of configuration code in your
clients
or going directly to the aws management
console
and following the step-by-step tutorial
learn more about amazon key spaces today
